original_text: All the people were very surprised and they said to each other, ‘Listen to what this man says! He has power and authority. He tells bad spirits to come out of people, and they come out.’
korean_text: 다 놀라 서로 말하여 이르되 이 어떠한 말씀인고 권위와 능력으로 더러운 귀신을 명하매 나가는도다 하더라

sentences.original_text: All the people were very surprised
and they said to each other
Listen to what this man says!
He tells bad spirits to come out of people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사람들에게서 나오라고 더러운 영들에게 명령합니다
